Package no.tornado.brap.auth

Interface Summary
AuthenticationProvider Authenticate the user by the supplied invocationRequest.
AuthorizationProvider Authorize the InvocationRequest by checking the principal in the current AuthenticationContext.
 

Class Summary
AnonymousPrincipal Default principal that will be returned from the AuthenticationContext if the active AuthenticationProvider does not set another one.
AuthenticationContext The AuthenticationContext holds the authenticated principal that can be used by the AuthorizationProvider and also by the service classes directly to retrieve information about the authenticated user.
AuthenticationNotRequiredAuthenticator AuthenticationProvider for not requiring authentication.
AuthenticationNotRequiredAuthorizer AthorizationProvider which authorizes all InvocationRequests.
AuthenticationRequiredAuthorizer This authenticator authorizes all authenticated requests.
DatabaseUsernamePasswordAuthenticator Authenticator that uses a JDBC datasource to perform the authentication.
SingleUsernamePasswordAuthenticator Simple AuthenticationProvider that can be pre-configured to authenticate incoming method invocations with a single username/password combination.
